entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, who has been discovered in a ridiculous position by Tonks.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: A person who is looking at Harry and handing him back his Invisibility Cloak.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: The one responsible for putting the Invisibility Cloak on Harry.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: A matron who is skilled in Healing spells and has more confidence than Tonks.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: An object that was put on Harry by Draco Malfoy.

entities.name: episkey
entities.description: A spell used by Tonks to heal Harry's nose.

relationships.description: Draco Malfoy put the Invisibility Cloak on Harry.
Tonks used the Episkey spell to heal Harry's nose.
Harry has more confidence in Madam Pomfrey than Tonks.
